mapper.insert: insert into TAG (TAG_ID, TAG_NAME, COUNT) values (TAG_SEQ.nextval, #{tagName}, 0)
mapper.update: update TAG set COUNT= COUNT+1 where TAG_NAME=#{tagName}
mapper.select: select count(*) from TAG where TAG_NAME=#{tagName}
select TAG.TAG_NAME from TAG join STORE_TAG on TAG.TAG_ID = STORE_TAG.TAG_ID where STORE_TAG.STORE_NUM = #{storeNum}
select TAG.TAG_NAME from TAG join REVIEW_TAG on TAG.TAG_ID = REVIEW.TAG_ID where REVIEW_TAG.REVIEW_NUM = #{reviewNum}
select TAG_ID from TAG where TAG_NAME=#{tagName}
mapper.insert: insert into REVIEW_TAG (REVIEW_NUM, TAG_ID) values (REVIEW_SEQ.currval, TAG_SEQ.currval)
insert into STORE_TAG (STORE_NUM, TAG_ID) values (#{storeNum}, TAG_SEQ.currval)
